alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued September 09 at 6:21PM EDT until September 09 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 677 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND CARROLL FREDERICK WASHINGTON IN NORTHEAST MARYLAND CECIL IN NORTHERN MARYLAND BALTIMORE BALTIMORE CITY HARFORD IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHWEST VIRGINIA CLARKE IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE WEST VIRGINIA BERKELEY JEFFERSON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABERDEEN, BALLENGER CREEK, BALTIMORE, BEL AIR, BERRYVILLE, CATONSVILLE, CHARLES TOWN, DUNDALK, EDGEWOOD, ELDERSBURG, ELKTON, ESSEX, FALLSTON, FREDERICK, HAGERSTOWN, HAVRE DE GRACE, JOPPATOWNE, MARTINSBURG, PARKVILLE, PIKESVILLE, RANDALLSTOWN, SHEPHERDSTOWN, TOWSON, AND WESTMINSTER.
